sentence.Network_en: Now that there is one, the eavesdropper's days may be numbered.
sentence.Network_cn: 既然现在有这样的设备了, 偷窥者的好日子将屈指可数.

sentence.Network_en: In transit, this information is scrambled and unintelligible to any eavesdropper.
sentence.Network_cn: 在传输过程, 对该信息进行编码,使窃听者无法获知真正的内容.

sentence.Network_en: Eve is the name that cryptographers give to an eavesdropper.
sentence.Network_cn: 而在量子加密法中,“伊芙”可以截取传输信息么?

list.abs: Beware of eavesdroppers !, 属垣有耳!
The wiretap , the electronic eavesdroppers would have public approval., 那时 , 电话窃听 , 电子窃听将会为社会所认可.

this reprogramming model immediately suggests one of the harder problems in sensor network design : how to secureagainst hackers , viruses and eavesdroppers .不过，这种更新程式的模型，立刻为感测网络的设计带来更困难的问题，也就是如何防堵骇客、病毒与窃贼的入侵。
because eavesdropping changes the physical nature of the information , users in a quantum exchange can easily detect eavesdroppers .偷听兑换信息的物质性质，用户在一量内交换能容易发现偷听的人。

entry.def: If you eavesdrop on someone, you listen secretly to what they are saying.

example.ex: The government illegally eavesdropped on his telephone conversations...
example.tran: 政府非法窃听了他的电话。

example.ex: The housemaid eavesdropped from behind the kitchen door.

means.word_mean: 1. a secret listener to private conversations

auth_sentence.content: Brando lifted an imaginary telephone, put it to his ear with a cunning, eavesdropper's smile.
